name: Portfolio
description: A showcase of my web development projects, highlighting skills in React and Tailwind CSS with interactive elements and live demos.

name: Travello
description: A travel booking app with smooth navigation, real-time pricing, and booking confirmation notifications.

name: Lazy's Bar and Restaurant
description: A menu app with real-time meal and drink data, authentication, search, and video recipe integration

name: LazyKitchen
description: A meal search app with category-based search, detailed preparation steps, and a modern UI.

name: iPhone 15 Pro Web Clone
description: A replica of Apple's iPhone 15 Pro website with GSAP animations, 3D rendering, and a custom video carousel.

name: Brainwave-Web
description: A modern UI/UX website featuring parallax effects, smooth animations, bento grids, and a responsive layout

name: Space-Web
description: A futuristic space-themed website featuring smooth animations, modern UI components, and interactive scrolling effects for an immersive experience.

name: Tour-Travel
description: A sleek and interactive travel booking website that allows users to explore destinations, book tours, and view travel packages with an engaging UI.

name: Dice-Game
description: A simple and fun dice game built with React, featuring smooth animations and an interactive interface.

name: Coz-Web
description: A modern and creative landing page featuring smooth animations, engaging UI elements, and a responsive layout.

name: Food-Eat
description: A stylish food ordering website featuring a modern UI, easy navigation, and a seamless user experience.

name: Car-Rent
description: A user-friendly car rental website allowing customers to browse cars, compare prices, and book rentals efficiently.

name: Foodie
description: A feature-rich food delivery web app with animated elements, interactive UI, and smooth user navigation.

name: Coffee-Cafe
description: A beautifully designed coffee shop website featuring a stylish UI, engaging visuals, and interactive sections.

name: PlusDemic
description: A business-oriented website with a clean and professional UI, featuring animations, call-to-action buttons, and smooth scrolling effects.

name: PopUp-Auth
description: A simple yet effective authentication modal popup for React applications, integrating social login options.

name: Fanta Hero
description: A vibrant and animated landing page for Fanta featuring dynamic UI elements, engaging motion effects, and smooth transitions.

name: Watch Store Hero
description: A visually appealing hero section for a watch store website with smooth animations, stylish UI, and a premium look.

name: Nike Hero
description: A sleek and modern hero section for a Nike product landing page, featuring smooth animations and a stylish design.
